findings.limitation_reason: Authorization errors prevent viewing execution details
attempts_made: Attempted to view execution #644 (ERROR) - received 'Unauthorized' error
Attempted to navigate to execution #645 (SUCCESS) - navigation aborted
Opened node panel in Editor mode - no execution data loaded
Node panel shows 'Execute this node to view data' - no historical execution output available

technical_details.editor_mode_limitation: In Editor mode without execution context, node panels only show configuration, not execution results
technical_details.authorization_issue: User account lacks permissions to view execution details, preventing extraction of HTTP responses, task IDs, or error messages

screenshots: sigma-poll.png - Executions list with success/error runs
sigma-error-unauthorized.png - Authorization error blocking execution details
sigma-sora-node-selected.png - Node selected in Editor mode
sigma-sora-panel-open.png - Node configuration panel (no execution data)
unable_to_extract: HTTP status code from Sora API response
Full error message text from failed executions
Request body sent to Sora API
Task ID from Start Sora Video node
Video status from Poll Sora Status node
recommendations: IMMEDIATE: Grant execution viewing permissions to inspect detailed error logs
Check n8n server logs directly for Sora API HTTP responses
Review OpenAI API dashboard for Sora video generation logs
Pattern suggests intermittent failures (2 errors, then success) - may be rate limiting or API availability issue
Consider adding error handling/retry logic in the workflow
conclusion: While the Sora video nodes exist and are configured correctly, authorization restrictions prevent detailed inspection of execution results. The workflow IS running (20+ executions), but experiences intermittent failures (~2 consecutive errors followed by success). Root cause diagnosis requires either elevated permissions or direct server/API log access.
